T H E S P A C E S B E T W E E N

Through a series of photographs, we aim to shed light on the difficult truths of this increasingly prevalent social issue. Although the objects left behind act as evidence of human presence, no people are pictured in these scenes, reflecting the homeless individuals that are frequently invisible in mainstream culture.

Organised by five students from NTU of different faiths who call themselves 'onemankind'
